Thank you to everyone who attended the 2017 Evening of Innovation & Celebration.  Excited that Steve Wozniak is joining our tech community!
A first-to-market mobile engagement technology that allows brands to connect with customers in those fleeting moments where app downloads don’t make sense.

Responsible for the quality, structure and management of data and information within the organization. This includes migration and cleansing of data moving in and out of the company, the appropriate structuring and enrichment of data in the transaction and decision support environments, and the presentation of quality data for use by data consumers.Collaborating with end users to identify needs and opportunities for improved data management and delivery.Overseeing the ongoing development and transitions to an operational data store and enterprise data warehouse.Engineering and streamlining processes regarding data flow and data quality to improve data accuracy, viability and value.Overseeing the ongoing development and operations of a business intelligence architecture that enables fact-based decision making and ad hoc analyses.Staying current with industry trends while advising and educating management on their relative importance and impact.
A non-profit organization dedicated to providing opportunities to students nearing completion of 2- and 4-year multimedia degrees to augment their transition into the local workforce.
Lab Technician, Strausfeld Lab, Department of Neuroscience

Worked with principle investigator for post doc research experiment to help determine how behavior in prey guides genetic evolution of predator’s physical characteristics.1) Conducted hook electrode experiments on the large descending axon of flies to measure neuron patterns during presentation of visual stimuli.  2) Statistical analytics (SPIKE, ANOVA, t-test, linear regression) and pattern modeling of neuron firing sequences corresponding to specific stimuli. 3) Mixed osmotic pressure stabilizers, maintained lab equipment, monitored population growth of test subjects.
Assistant to Principle Investigator, Biocontrol Systems Lab

Assisted principal investigator and bioengineering team with experimental design for biocontrol systems research: optimizing strategies for human movement, gait analysis, anthro-robotic systems, bioinstrumentation, bioelectricity, biosensors and bioelectronic devices.

Ryan is the embodiment of Passion, Dream and Hard Work. He showed me that these three things are needed to make a company successful. He is always on the move, pushing for things to work and above all, he never settles for less that perfection. He has had a great impact in my professional carrier and is a very good friend of mine.Cheers!

Ryan Quinn is a modern day Renaissance Man.  Scientist, artist, capitalist, biologist, and software engineer, Ryan possesses an incredible depth of expertise across numerous complementary disciplines.  His entrepreneurial passion and boundless vision are well grounded by a keen business sense and a natural affinity for rigorous analysis.  Ryan is driven by an innate sense of purpose to accomplish great things, often through providing leadership for collaborative groups of talented individuals.  A quick study, he is well versed in the latest technology, business models, and emerging market opportunities.  I consider it only a matter of time before Ryan becomes extraordinarily successful and well known.

I worked with Lino to take a concept and build it into a thriving startup. He is one of the best complex problem-solvers I have worked with. Lino truly understands a vast array of different system architectures at the most granular levels; as is apparent in the way he can describe them simply. At the heart of what drives him, Lino is a teacher who cares about the success of his colleagues. He will work hard and find innovative solutions because he takes great pride in the final product. I’m thankful to know him!

Swarna is an innovative, experienced team player that thrives in a collaborative work environment. She brings with her a positive mindset determined to help her teams succeed. During her time at BrightGuest, she proved herself as a dedicated problem-solver that helped build our platform from design to a functional product that solves real-world problems for our customers. This was all done in a fast-paced high-pressure environment that she excelled in. I consider Swarna to be a highly valuable asset to any team and commend her for contributing to our scalability as we grew from an idea into a market leader in mobile engagement.

summary: It takes a spectrum of different intelligences to bring momentum to a cause. Recognizing people's collaborative potential is vital to starting, building and growing a successful company. Remain flexible in your pursuit, but unwavering in your determination—and by all means, surround yourself with people who've done it before.
